Name: Space Panic: Room Escape (VR)
About the game: Space Panic VR (Room Escape) is a VR Escape Room unlike any other you've seen before. Set in the future aboard a space station, the game will challenge players to solve multiple complex puzzles in order to escape. Try Panic Mode if you want more of a challenge. Features: Panic Mode with time constraints Compete with other players to get the best times on the Leaderboards Room scale with Arc Teleport Item belt for conveniently holding more than 2 items Spatial audio realistically enhances objects and various other sound effects. Haptic feedback when touching interactable objects High definition textures and graphics with the power of Unity 5 Experience being in orbit around Earth
Publishers: Project Whitecard Studios Inc.,EvolVR Games Ltd.
